description: Updates the settings for the specified voice profile domain.

nested_items.name: VoiceProfileDomain
nested_items.description: The updated details of the voice profile domain.

nested_items.name: VoiceProfileDomainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the voice profile domain.

nested_items.name: VoiceProfileDomainArn
nested_items.description: The voice profile domain's Amazon Resource Number (ARN).

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the voice profile domain.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the voice profile domain.

nested_items.name: ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration
nested_items.description: A structure that contains the configuration settings for server-side encryption.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the KMS key used to encrypt the enrollment data in a voice profile domain. Asymmetric customer managed keys are not supported.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the voice profile domain was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the voice profile was last updated.
